title: List of all Androidibeacon  for  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidibeacon  for  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: Bluetooth-LE-Library---Android
repoList.description: This library allows for easy access to a Bluetooth LE device's AdRecord and RSSI value. It offers additional functionality for iBeacons.

repoList.name: Android-iBeacon-Demo
repoList.description: Demo app for the Android library providing APIs to interact with iBeacons which is developed by:  http://developer.radiusnetworks.com/ibeacon/android/index.html

repoList.name: ibeacon-scanner-android
repoList.description: Android library to scan for iBeacons.

repoList.name: okble
repoList.description: An easy-to-use BLE library for android.  简单易用的android BLE library

repoList.name: beacon-keeper
repoList.description: Simple android library for working with iBeacons in background

repoList.name: react-native-ibeacons
repoList.description: React Native library for detecting beacons (iOS and Android)

repoList.name: lantern
repoList.description: A simple iBeacon wrapper library for Android

repoList.name: luch
repoList.description: Small and easy to use Android library for BLE beacon monitoring

repoList.name: ibeacon_heatmap_demo
repoList.description: This app demonstrate accuracy of iBeacons inside of a room and tries to generate heat map using them. Because of iBeacon's proximity error, we have to use some approximation method to increase the precision of our position. Used iBeacon lib for distance https://github.com/alt236/Bluetooth-LE-Library---Android

repoList.name: android-beacon-example
repoList.description: This app shows how to use the altbeacon library with a custom parser so we can scan for true ibeacon specced beacons
